item.description:
This is Part Two of the afternoon's events:
A multiple languages German/French walk with people from all around the state! The "Lock 12 Historic Park" is the name of this pretty section of the trail. It is flat and along a canal. We will walk for one or two hours, depending on interest.
There is a gourmet ice cream shop down the road at the interesection with Route 10 for those people who don't want to miss that opportunity! It is called Sweet Claude's.
We are joining together with a German Meetup from Fairfield/Westchester so we will finally meet German speakers from other Meetups!

Pouring rain cancels the walk.
item.how_to_find_us: we will be in the parking area
item.name: Spaziergang- a German walk!
